title: You have disconnected form the game - In Loading Screen
body:
The two games I played today had an issue. 

I went through champ select just fine. No problems there.

Then, as the game is loading, I get the message, "You have disconnected from the game". I click retry and it goes right back to that message. 
Weird thing is, if I disconnect from my wireless network and relog, I can get right back into the game and It's fine from there. I lose about a minute from the game.

After the game, it told me that my account was being used on another device but I've never given my password to anyone and it never said that in the three years ive been playing.

Any thoughts?

replies.body: If the client did pop up saying that you had logged in from another device, that is most likely the reason you were having issues getting reconnected. It seems like someone else had figured out your login info one way or another, in which case I'd suggest reaching out to our account team asap in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to resecure your account!
